instruction: def OP_2 (I : Set (Set α)) (h : ideal I) : Decidable (∃ A ⊆ I, (inter_family A) ∧ (∀ B ⊆ I, (inter_family B) → (#B ≤ #A)) ∧ (star A)) := by sorry

initialize.expr: def ideal (I : Set (Set α)) : Prop := ∃ F : Filter α, I = {i : Set α | ∃ f ∈ F.sets, i = fᶜ }
def inter_family (A : Set (Set α)) : Prop := ∀ X ∈ A, ∀ Y ∈ A, (X ∩ Y) ≠ ∅
def star (A : Set (Set α)) : Prop := (⋂ X ∈ A, X) ≠ ∅
def OP_2 (I : Set (Set α)) (h : ideal I) : Decidable (∃ A ⊆ I, (inter_family A) ∧ (∀ B ⊆ I, (inter_family B) → (#B ≤ #A)) ∧ (star A)) := by sorry
